statements: SELECT * FROM employee_attendance WHERE employee_id = 100;
SELECT employee_id, date, time_in FROM employee_attendance WHERE date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT employee_id, time_in, time_out FROM employee_attendance WHERE time_out > '09:00:00';
SELECT * FROM employee_attendance WHERE leave_request_date = '2022-10-20' AND leave_status = 'Approved';
SELECT employee_id, date, leave_request_date FROM employee_attendance WHERE leave_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_attendance WHERE date = '2022-12-01';
SELECT employee_id, time_in FROM employee_attendance WHERE time_out < '12:00:00';
SELECT * FROM employee_attendance WHERE leave_request_date = '2022-12-15' AND leave_status = 'Approved';
SELECT employee_id, date, time_out FROM employee_attendance WHERE time_in > '09:00:00' AND time_in < '12:00:00';
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id FROM employee_attendance WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-12-01' AND '2022-12-15';
SELECT * FROM employee_attendance WHERE employee_id = 100
SELECT employee_id, date_attended, status FROM employee_attendance ORDER BY date_attended DESC
SELECT * FROM leave_requests WHERE status = 'approved' ORDER BY start_date ASC
SELECT request_id, start_date, end_date, reason FROM leave_requests WHERE employee_id = 200
SELECT employee_id, reason FROM leave_requests WHERE status = 'pending'
SELECT employee_id, date_attended, time_in FROM employee_attendance WHERE status = 'Present';
SELECT employee_id, time_in, time_out FROM employee_attendance WHERE date_attended BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31';
SELECT employee_id, date_attended, time_in, time_out FROM employee_attendance WHERE time_out IS NOT NULL AND status = 'Late';
SELECT employee_id, date_attended, time_in, time_out FROM employee_attendance ORDER BY date_attended DESC, time_in ASC;

SELECT L.employee_id, L.start_date, L.end_date, L.reason, A.date_attended, A.time_in FROM leave_requests AS L INNER JOIN employee_attendance AS A ON L.employee_id = A.employee_id WHERE L.status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee WHERE department='IT';
SELECT employee_name, job_title FROM Employee ORDER BY job_title DESC;
SELECT * FROM AttendanceRecord WHERE check_in BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT employee_name, start_date, end_date FROM LeaveRequest WHERE status='approved';
SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE department='HR';
SELECT employee_name, job_title FROM Employee ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee WHERE employee_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT employee_name, start_date, end_date FROM Employee JOIN LeaveRequest ON Employee.employee_id = LeaveRequest.employee_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_employees FROM Employee;
SELECT * FROM Employee;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee ORDER BY department ASC;
SELECT employee_id, position FROM Employee WHERE department = 'Finance';
SELECT * FROM Attendance WHERE status = 'Present';
SELECT employee_name, start_date, end_date FROM LeaveRequests ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Employee WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM Employee ORDER BY department DESC;
SELECT employee_name, position FROM Employee WHERE employee_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Attendance WHERE status = 'Present' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, start_date, end_date FROM Employee JOIN LeaveRequests ON Employee.employee_id = LeaveRequests.employee_id WHERE status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, employee_department FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, employee_position FROM employees WHERE employee_department='HR';
SELECT employee_name, employee_position FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_department='IT' AND employee_position='Developer';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_name, employee_position FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, date FROM employees JOIN attendance_records ON employees.employee_id = attendance_records.employee_id WHERE date = '2022-01-10';
SELECT employee_name, start_date, end_date FROM employees JOIN leave_requests ON employees.employee_id = leave_requests.employee_id WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT department_name, COUNT(*) FROM departments JOIN employees ON departments.department_id = employees.employee_department GROUP BY department_name ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC;
